summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2019 COACHMAN  SHASTA RV . WHILE DRIVING OR PARKED THE REAR VIEW CAMERA WOULD NOT FUNCTION. THE CONTACT STATED IT ONLY WOULD ACTIVATE WHEN THE DIRECTIONAL FOR THE LEFT OR RIGHT TURN SIGNAL IS ACTIVATE . THE CONTACT NOTIFIED THE LOCAL DEALER  FINDLAY RV (4530 BOULDER HWY, LAS VEGAS, NV 89121) BUT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGONISED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFATURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 4,000.
